name: Modern & Cozy | 1 min to Subway + 12 min Downtown
neighborhood_overview: 1 min walk to MBTA public transportation. Shops, bakeries restaurants all in walking distance. Be downtown Boston in minutes and all connecting transit lines
description:
Nicely decorated room with a queen bed that comfortably sleeps 2. You will have access to a full kitchen, living room and 2 bathrooms. 1 min walk to public transportation with access to redline to downtown Boston, South station(commuter rail). The neighborhood has several restaurants and bars nearby, bakeries, coffee and ice cream shop.

The space
The unit is very large with 4 bedrooms in total. Access a fully stocked kitchen (shared) with everything you will need. 2 very large shared bathrooms, shared living room and WiFi ready.

Guest access
Living room, kitchen and 2 bathrooms. In the summer there is an outdoor space available with table and chairs

Other things to note
ON street Parking is LIMITED if you DRIVE private parking may be an additional $10 a day so please reserve during busy season.

License number
STR-413706
